sentence.Network_en: Clark had somehow been able to coerce Jenny into doing whatever he told her to do.
sentence.Network_cn: 不知是用什么办法，克拉克总能让珍妮对他言听计从。

sentence.Network_en: Obama would deploy soft power the power attract rather than coerce.
sentence.Network_cn: 奥巴马将运用“巧实力外交”的拉拢性力量取代强制性力量.

sentence.Network_en: To coerce or inhibit by or as if by threats.
sentence.Network_cn: 威胁通过威胁或近乎威胁强制或禁止.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 是被强制(coerced)，或是被奴役(enslaved)了22。
侠_百度百科 ... ⒋ 侠客[ knight-errant] ⒈ 要挟[ coerce;force].
...coalition n. 结合，联合；结合体，同盟；（政党、个人、国家等）临时结成的联盟coerce vt. 强制；胁迫；迫使；抑制，压制；强制实行（或实现）cohesion n. 黏合（性）；聚合（性）；团结，结合；内聚性；内聚力；【植】连着.
&quot;劫&quot;到底是什么_百度知道 ... 劫掠乡民 jiénàn 威胁;威逼〖 threaten;coerce〗 抢夺;强取〖 plunder;raid;rob〗.

list.abs: 1. 强制执行强制还债 coerce payment自愿还债 voluntary payment
her parents coerced her into marrying the man ., 她的父母强迫她嫁给那个人.
不能偿还债务 inability to pay debt强制执行 coerce execution-
强奸 ： rape强迫婚姻 ： coerced marriage强迫仲裁 ： compulsory arbitration

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin coercere 'restrain', from co- 'jointly, together' + arcere 'restrain'

entry.def: If you coerce someone into doing something, you make them do it, although they do not want to.

example.ex: Potter had argued that the government coerced him into pleading guilty...
example.tran: 波特辩称是政府强迫他认罪的。

example.ex: Clark had somehow been able to coerce Jenny into doing whatever he told her to do.
example.tran: 不知是用什么办法，克拉克总能让珍妮对他言听计从。

means.word_mean: 1. to cause to do through pressure or necessity, by physical, moral or intellectual means :"She forced him to take a job in the city";

auth_sentence.content: You can only coerce politically, economically and militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can only coerce politically, economically and militarily.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can only coerce politically, economically and militarily.

auth_sentence.content: People are tortured in order to coerce them to confess.
auth_sentence.res_content: People are tortured in order to coerce them to confess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: People are tortured in order to coerce them to confess.

auth_sentence.content: To coerce a man is to deprive him of freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content: To coerce a man is to deprive him of freedom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To coerce a man is to deprive him of freedom.

sentences.en: I was coerced into joining the gang.
He was coerced into making a confession.
The courts heard that the six defendants had been coerced into making a confession.
sentences.cn: 法官审判时发现6位被告人曾被迫承认罪行。
